name: Ziondu (Cursed Room)
description:
You would get out of your comfort zone, This mystery, this room, and just try to get out of it asap. In the final section, you would be given a choice. It's up to you to decide.

  • Game Play Time: 20-30min 
  • Genre: Horror, Action, Survive
  • Age limit: Ask your mom (PEGI 40+)
WARNING

This game contains loud jump-scares, flashing lights, not nice stuff (as a joke), blood, and violence (not realistic, but a bit realistic).

This game is my 1st indie horror game. Let me know what you think about the game in the comments below, your support will really help me to develop my future games! and please report any bugs or lags. BTW, this game is coded in Unreal Engine 5.1, so OC your graphic card. Thank you.

For Playing the game you need to install the latest DirectX 11:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/download/confirmation.aspx?id=17431

and for DirectX 12:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/download/details.aspx?id=35

Support: imax.one@outlook.com
